name: provisionAzureCosmosDocumentDb
author: InCycleSoftwareInc-DEV

inputs.name: ConnectedServiceName
inputs.label: Azure Release Manager Subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown: Azure Resource Manager Subscription to target deplpoyment.

inputs.name: ResourceGroupName
inputs.label: Resource Group
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the Azure Resource Group for deployment.

inputs.name: Location
inputs.label: Location
inputs.helpMarkDown: Location for deploying the resource group. If the resource group already exists in the subscription, then this value will be ignored.

inputs.name: CosmosDbConsistencyLevel
inputs.label: Cosmos Database Consistency Level
inputs.helpMarkDown: Cosmos Database Consistency Levels (Strongest to Weakest): Strong, Bounded Staleness, Session, Consistent Prefix, Eventual

inputs.name: CosmosDbConsistencyPolicyMaxStalenessPrefix
inputs.label: Consistency Policy Max Staleness (Requests)
inputs.helpMarkDown: The maximum number of stale requests to be tolerated.

inputs.name: Output_Endpoint
inputs.label: Cosmos Endpoint
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide a name for the variable for the created cosmosdb. The variable can be used as $(variableName) to refer to the database in subsequent tasks.

instanceNameFormat: Accelerators - Create Azure Cosmos Document Database
